title: Delving (1C6)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Exert a Dwarf companion to draw 3 cards.
Lore:	”'…they delved too greedily and too deep, and disturbed that from which they fled, Durin's Bane.'”
Rarity:	C
